import sys
import math

a, b, k, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
mod = 1000000007

def get_possibilities(a, b, k, t):
    possibilities = 0
    for i in range(-k, k + 1):
        for j in range(-k, k + 1):
            possibilities += math.factorial(t) / (math.factorial(i) * math.factorial(j) * math.factorial(t - i - j))
    return possibilities % mod

print(get_possibilities(a, b, k, t) - get_possibilities(b, a, k, t))
